name: Connection (Molten Labs)
description:
CONNECTION

Connection  is a fun casual puzzle game where your goal is to place the objects correctly.

=> Controls are simple and are explained in the game., two objects are connected and follows the same direction.

=> 15 Amazing levels to play through. If I get some spare before the jam, I might add more levels :D

=> You can also download the source file and design some levels. Feel free to share your work with me and others.

Credits :

Music : https://www.bensound.com/ for your great music. Keep making awesome tracks.

ExtraCredits : Thank you for your awesome lectures on your channel. Keep the good work going. <3

=> That's all, Try it and I hope you like the game.

Extra Credits Challenges: Extra Open :  Source file attached. Extra Remix :  Added the quit feature I recently implemented in my previous project ATROPOS where you can hold down escape button to exit the game. Also implemented the mouse free game-play from ATROPOS. Extra Monochromatic
